title: MARINATED ZUCCHINI & TOMATO LASAGNA WITH CASHEW HERB CHEESE
directions: To marinate the zucchini and tomatoes: slice the zuke into thin strips on a mandolin, and chop the tomatoes. Rub them in oil and spices and put in the dehydrator for 1-3 hours, or in the oven at the lowest temperature.
To make the cheese: blend everything until smooth and very thick.
To assemble: layer slices of tomato, zucchini and spinach with cheese. Sprinkle with cilantro and coriander. Chomp.
ingredients: Olive oil, Himalayan salt, black pepper and coriander
